Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server

Interface ActionPoster

All Superinterfaces:
ActionAgent
All Known Implementing Classes:
Game, VVServer
public interface ActionPoster extends ActionAgent
Interface that ensures the implementation of methods to handle a collection of listeners in a "listeners" architecture

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addListener(ActionListener listener, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
    It adds a new listener to the container of listeners in a "poster" class
    List<ActionListener>
    getListeners()
    Getter for the list of listeners
    void
    notifyListeners(Action event, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
    It notifies all the listeners of an event It will probably call the onEvent method of ActionListener interface
    void
    removeListener(ActionListener listener, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
    It removes a new listener to the container of listeners in a "poster" class

  • Method Details

    • addListener

      void addListener(ActionListener listener, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
      It adds a new listener to the container of listeners in a "poster" class
      Parameters:
      listener - Reference to the new object which implements "action listener"
      listenersContainer - Collection of the listeners

    • removeListener

      void removeListener(ActionListener listener, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
      It removes a new listener to the container of listeners in a "poster" class
      Parameters:
      listener - Reference to the object you want to remove
      listenersContainer - Collection of the listeners

    • notifyListeners

      void notifyListeners(Action event, Collection<ActionListener> listenersContainer)
      It notifies all the listeners of an event It will probably call the onEvent method of ActionListener interface
      Parameters:
      event - Message to post
      listenersContainer - Collection of the listeners

    • getListeners

      List<ActionListener> getListeners()
      Getter for the list of listeners
      Returns:
      the list of references of the listeners
